author: egliwyona
msg: * The "invalid byte 2 of 3-byte UTF-8 sequence" exception is fixed
now. It was a problem with using a plain Filewriter instead of using
an XMLWriter to write the xml back to disk.
* only the filename is inserted in the media tag as per felix request.
* the media tag is now inserted before the imageXPath.

author: michicms
msg: removed, was only good for playing around with
